# uptimekuma_notification_callmebot (Resource)

CallMeBot notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_callmebot" "example" {
  name       = "CallMeBot WhatsApp"
  endpoint   = "https://api.callmebot.com/whatsapp.php?phone=YOUR_PHONE&text="
  is_active  = true
  is_default = false
}

resource "uptimekuma_notification_callmebot" "telegram_example" {
  name       = "CallMeBot Telegram"
  endpoint   = "https://api.callmebot.com/telegram.php?token=YOUR_TOKEN&chat_id=YOUR_CHAT_ID&text="
  is_active  = true
  is_default = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `endpoint` (String, Sensitive) CallMeBot endpoint URL where notifications will be sent
- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
